body: It's like we're back to C75 something era, where this is just a simple short illustration book with simply drawn sex scenes.

"The company prohibits lewd art " the company can prohibit what ever it wants but they can't do a damn thing about it. I hope people keep making lewds out of spite because it's just arrogance to say 'You can lewd shipgirls, Fate, even draw babycon but please don't draw horsegirls. I might make the owners uncomfortable!'

I find it hilarious that people keeps lewding ship-girls, who are also based off real ships, with real people sacrificed their lives and died for war, and nobody bats an eye. Yet when it comes to horse-girls, people start acting to their lewds like it's the end of the world.
Porn will be made regardless of what the creators say. Also, Teio is best girl.

@Doctor of Rhodes Island doesn't seem to be happening. The company prohibits lewd art of uma musume characters because the real-life-horse-owners the umamusu characters are based on also don't want lewd art of uma musu characters. or that's what I heard.

i mean i personally think it sucks that they banned it but if that's what the real owners want then idk what to say lol, prob could fap to other horse girl doujins on this site
We need season 2 douijns especially Rice Shower!
all i can say teio is so cute
Yes!! Tokai Teio is in the barn house!!
You're all on the fucking watchlist

NOOOOO WAAAYYYYY!!!
PLS NOT UMA MUSUME
savor it bois, this is the last uma musume doujin

as a Teio fan, im greatly grateful for this
now i can drop my usual ntr for some cute wholesome faps
